name: Page & Post Notes
author: YYDevelopment

sections.description:
The page & post notes plugin allow you to add notes on pages and posts on your wordpress website.

With this plugin you will be able to easily create notes with important data and remove them if required.

Page & Post Notes Plugin Features

  • The ability to add notes to all pages and posts on your wordpress websites
  • The ability to add as many notes you want for each page and post
  • The ability to remove notes you don’t want anymore
  • The ability to change text direction to rtl and ltr
  • The ability to add separator line to the text
  • The ability to save notes also on wordpress dashbaord

sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/page-post-notes directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
sections.faq:
Do i need to take any action to make this plugin work?

All you need to do it to install and activate the plugin. Once you do that you will see the notes option on your pages and posts

sections.reviews:
Thank you!

By egocefalo on March 9, 2024

Thanks for the plugin!

Please don't abandon it. There is simply no other plugin that does the same or at least none that I could find, and beleive me, I searched for quite a while.

If you could add the option for it to replicate/copy the notes on all created posts with the same tags it would be extreme.

Thanks again!

Just what I need

By (polygeek) on January 16, 2024

It provides a handy place to leave notes. I used to leave notes at the bottom of my draft, but that's risky because I've forgotten and left them in there a few times after publishing. This plugin removes that possibility. Thanks.

Good plugin

By ailaina123456 on December 24, 2023

Hi,

Thanks for your plugin, it does help a lot and works smoothly!

To make it more functional, I would also suggest to add a column on the page/posts list with a tag and filter system to be able to search and filter the notes and its content from there itself, that would be awesome!

Regards

Good Plugin but...

By ehoff on March 15, 2023

I like this plugin. It is simple and adds a nice feature. I hooked into this plugin and added the notes into a column to the admin post list. (If you provide a link to Github, I am willing to share this functionality ;) )

While developing this, I discovered the database structure...

| id | page_post_id | notes |
| 1  | 12813        | Note 1direction-ltr###Note 2direction-ltr###Note 3direction-ltr###Note 4direction-ltr###Note 5direction-ltr###Note 6direction-ltr |

Why is everything concatinated? I am willing to change to a five start, if you fix this^^ Just create an entry per note and an extra column for the direction instead of concatinating everything.

Would be great to add note to the Pages table

By merlinker on February 12, 2023

This addon is good, but when you look upon Pages table in admin - you do not see if any page has a note - no such column. In Joomla each article Title has substring available for admin comment for future use. Would be great to have something like that here too. Otherwise it is very hard to work with items in the table, especially if there is no way to sort them by extra field

superb

By cornopean (cornopeanus) on January 19, 2023

This plugin is terrific. I use it constantly when I have things I need to incorporate into a page but don't have time to do it right then. Extremely useful

Wonderul for Documentation

By flyingkites on March 2, 2022

This is a wonderful plugin that allows you to add documentation for Pages (or Posts). It helped us to define the purpose of a page and actions to be taken if the page was edited. We were able to add comments like why a page might not be in a menu and where it was linked from etc. I would prefer an explicit SAVE button as I lost my first attempt at a note and could not work out why. One note per page is enough for us. It would be good to be able to see the note in the Page listing. At least first "x" characters.
